message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $11,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you and this is a fair price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,250? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $9,800? I'm trying to stay within my budget.
